title: Whatsapp Plus 3.60 100% Tested Ban Free [Latest]
description:
WhatsApp Plus v3.60 Apk 

WhatsApp Plus is the newly underdevelopment whatsapp mod, which aftert the ban is now continued for furthur development. Many Popular Whatsapp Moders are developing this awesome app, which can be used alternatively for the original Whatsapp. This application provides loads amazing features, experience it yourself installing it.

Key Features of Whats App Plus

COLORFUL : Basically it is a customizable WhatsApp where you can change lots of colors, sizes, and many other things.

EXTRA UPLOAD LIMIT : In addition you can increase upload media limit (stock limit is 16Mb) to send large music files or videos.

SEND ORIGINAL PIC : You can increase quality of pictures sent (by default resolution is decreased quite a lot)

AD FREE : No adds as per original WhatsApp

QUICK SHARE : You can share music just with one click.

PARTIAL COPY/PASTE : You can select the part you want to copy from text rather copying whole text and send it to people in your contact.

WATCH STATUS : You can directly watch status in the chat screen from WhatsApp Plus
HIDE PROFILE PICTURE : You can hide contact profile pictures and show phonebook pictures (in chat screen).

LOAD OF THEMES : Built-in theme viewer and downloader. Check WhatsApp+ users themes online and apply theme if you like.

NO BAN of any accounts.


How to Install ?

First Download WhatsApp Plus APK file and save it in your PC or Phone.

Take the Backup of your chats and broadcast lists.

Delete or Uninstall the WhatsApp which is already available in your Device.

Open the APK file and install the same in your Android smartphone.

Now follow the screen instruction. Accept the installation with the â€œAcceptâ€ button.

Congratulation, now you successfully installed the WhatsApp Plus in your device.
Now Restore the Backup to get all chats and broadcast list back.

Enjoy WhatsApp Plus & Reborn.

Updates of New Version: v3.60

[ New ] Ability to backup your conversations to Google Drive ( may not work )

[ New ] Ability to preview links in Conversation Screen
[ New ] Ability to chat with received attached contact without need to save number in your device
[ Support ] android older versions ( 2.3 & above )
[ New ] Unblock Telegram links in Conversation â€¦
You know WhatsApp Inc. had blocked telegram links in Conversation ( Non-clickable ) .. Now , Itâ€™s clickable
[ Updated ] translations ( Spanish , Portuguese & Italian )
Bug fixes
